text:
We experience that all fields in a module disappears in the editor if we change a custom module from global true to global false in the meta.json file. Anyone who has experienced this and knows what the issue is? All markup and field code persists.

available for new content is set to true

Solved:

1. Changing the module from global:true to global:false
2. Editing fields.json where fields were set to locked:true -> locked:false
3. In the Design Tool editor, somehow, Prevent from editing in content editor was set to true -> false
Now everything works
